
############################## Experiment details ##############################

output_dir: output/rsvd_r128_cnn-2022-08-03_21:59:32/
model: cnn
num_rounds: 100
eval_every: 10
ServerType: <class 'nla_cnn_exp.nla_cnn.<locals>.make_comp_server_client.<locals>.CompServer'>

clients_per_round: 10
client_lr: 0.06
batch_size: 64
seed: 0
use_val_set: False
num_epochs: 10
gpus_per_client_cluster: 1
num_client_clusters: 2
save_model: False

############################## Simulation ##############################

100 total clients: 100 CompClients
